_metadata.description: Ground truth extraction results for meeting-003.vtt golden dataset
_metadata.purpose: Golden test data for ts-extractor validation - edge case parsing and late joiner handling
notes: Edge Cases Meeting with W3C VTT parsing challenges
Initial 3 speakers + 2 late joiners (Diana at 5:00, Eve at 10:00)
Contains: 10 action items, 4 decisions, 3 questions, 7 topics
Incorporates: multiline payloads, voice tag classes, nested formatting, entity escapes, unicode
Tests dynamic speaker detection for late joiners

action_items.text: Increase rate limit to 200 requests per minute

citation.text_snippet: The rate limit needs to be at least 200 requests per minute. I'll implement the change.

action_items.text: Update developer documentation with threshold logic

citation.text_snippet: I can take that. I'll update the docs this afternoon.

action_items.text: Prepare migration rollback procedure as backup

citation.text_snippet: I'll prepare the rollback procedure as backup.

action_items.text: Send maintenance notification 48 hours in advance

citation.text_snippet: I'll send the maintenance notification 48 hours in advance.

action_items.text: Prepare status page update for migration

citation.text_snippet: I'll prepare a status page update. Can someone review it before I publish?
I can review it. Send it to me by Friday.

action_items.text: Set up CloudFront CDN for international users
Implement lazy loading component with skeleton screens

citation.text_snippet: I'll implement the lazy loading component.

action_items.text: Perform mobile performance testing after implementation

citation.text_snippet: I'll need 1 day for mobile performance testing after implementation.

decisions.text: Increase rate limit to 200 requests per minute
decisions.rationale: Current 100 req/min limit hit within 30 seconds by peak users, affecting 15% of users

citation.text_snippet: We decided to increase the rate limit to 200 requests per minute.

decisions.text: Schedule database migration for Sunday 3 AM
decisions.rationale: 15 minutes downtime acceptable for SLA, low traffic window

citation.text_snippet: We decided on Sunday 3 AM for the migration window.

decisions.text: Implement CDN and lazy loading for mobile performance
decisions.decided_by: team consensus (Eve proposed CDN, Bob confirmed)
decisions.rationale: Image loading is main bottleneck; international users complaining about latency

citation.text_snippet: We agreed to implement CDN and lazy loading for mobile performance.

decisions.text: Target next Friday for mobile performance release with staged rollout
decisions.rationale: CDN 3 days + lazy loading 2 days + testing 1 day = about a week

citation.text_snippet: We decided to target next Friday for mobile performance release.

questions.text: Should we record the meeting for those who join late?

citation.text_snippet: Should we record the meeting for those who join late?

questions.text: How long will the database migration downtime be?
questions.answer_summary: Estimated 15 minutes, script optimized to minimize downtime

citation.text_snippet: How long will the downtime be? Our SLA requires 99.9% uptime.

answer_citation.text_snippet: Estimated 15 minutes. I've optimized the script to minimize downtime.

questions.text: Should we do a staged rollout for mobile performance deployment?
questions.answer_summary: Yes, start with 10%, then 50%, then 100% of traffic

citation.text_snippet: Should we do a staged rollout?

answer_citation.text_snippet: Yes, let's start with 10% of traffic, then 50%, then 100%.

topics.title: Meeting Setup and Recording
topics.summary: Alice starts meeting while waiting for others. Bob suggests recording. Diana and Eve will be late.

topics.title: API Rate Limiting Issue
topics.summary: Charlie reports 429 errors affecting 15% of users. Decision: Increase limit from 100 to 200 req/min. Charlie to update docs.

topics.title: Database Migration Timeline
topics.summary: Migration script ready, 15 minutes downtime. Diana joins (late). Decision: Sunday 3 AM window.

topics.title: Customer Notification and Status Page
topics.summary: Alice to send 48-hour notice. Diana to prepare status page update, Bob to review by Friday.

topics.title: Mobile App Performance Issues
topics.summary: Eve joins (late). Image loading bottleneck identified. Decision: Implement CDN and lazy loading. International users in S達o Paulo, Tokyo, M端nchen affected.

topics.title: Mobile Performance Timeline
topics.summary: CDN 3 days + lazy loading 2 days + testing 1 day. Decision: Target next Friday with staged rollout (10%, 50%, 100%).

topics.title: Meeting Recap and Action Items
topics.summary: Alice recaps: Bob (rate limits, rollback), Charlie (docs, lazy loading), Diana (status page, monitoring), Eve (CDN, deployment), Alice (notifications, stakeholders).

edge_case_markers._note: This meeting incorporates W3C WebVTT edge cases for parser validation

multiline_payload.description: Cue with multi-line text payload (ML-001, ML-002)

voice_tag_with_class.description: Voice tag with CSS class: <v.urgent Bob> (VT-006, VT-007)

late_joiners.description: Diana joins at 5:00, Eve joins at 10:00 - tests dynamic speaker detection

multiple_speakers_same_cue.description: Two speakers in one cue: <v Alice>Thanks Bob.</v> <v Diana>Thanks... (VT-009)

unicode_text.description: International characters: S達o Paulo, Tokyo, M端nchen (CE-003, CE-004)
